basics.name: Marcela Aguilar
basics.label: Ph.D. Candidate in Business, Accounting
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate at Rice University with extensive experience in research on the informal economy and a strong background in economics. Passionate about applying academic insights to real-world problems.

work.name: International Labour Organization (ILO)
work.summary: Coordinated research and policy design on the informal economy across multiple Central American countries. Acted as ILO representative to the UN Country Team in El Salvador.
highlights: Led research on informal economy causes in Central America
Designed surveys and strategies for transitioning to formal economy

work.name: UNICEF
work.summary: Conducted research on the impacts of violence on educational outcomes for school-aged children in Latin American countries.

publications.name: The Impact of Community Violence on Educational Outcomes: A review of the literature
